mapper.select: SELECT a.userItemNo, a.userId, a.itemId, a.regDate, b.itemName, b.price, b.description, b.pictureUrl FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.itemId = b.itemId WHERE userItemNo = #{userItemNo}

SELECT a.userItemNo, a.userId, a.itemId, a.regDate, b.itemName, b.price, b.description, b.pictureUrl FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.itemId = b.itemId WHERE a.userItemNo > 0 ORDER BY a.userItemNo DESC, regDate DESC

SELECT a.userItemNo, a.userId, a.itemId, a.regDate, b.itemName, b.price, b.description, b.pictureUrl FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.itemId = b.itemId WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY a.userItemNo DESC, regDate DESC
SELECT a.userItemNo, a.itemId, b.itemName, b.price, COUNT(*) AS purchase FROM user_item a INNER JOIN item b ON a.itemId = b.itemId WHERE a.itemId = #{itemId} ORDER BY purchase DESC LIMIT 10
